lines.text: Is ''bleed'' a status effect? I forget if that counts or not.
You don't remember? I thought you were a prodigy at all this magic junk!
H-hey! I am! It's just, who can remember every little thing like that? So many details!
Anyway, I think you're barkin' up the wrong tree.
Why would he try to turn a guy to stone if he's already been shot?
Plus, those two look like they were on the same side.
Unless you find the Stop Wizard had a motive to double-cross his buddy, I don't think he'd do that to 'im.
Or... wait. D'you think he might've been trying to keep his friend from bleedin' out?
Statue 'im up so he didn't lose too much blood, on the way to the hospital?
Nah. Flesh to Stone is a permanent effect, as far as I know.
